## KeyValueRepository.expire() method

Set up ttl for an entry by key

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
expire(key: string, ttl: number, options?: Options): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Key for the entry |
|  ttl | <code>number</code> | Ttl for the entry |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
